House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02100
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A DRUG REHABILITATION CENTER IN THE CITY OF PASAY AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
